definition: spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能時開始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: I can't move any farther; I'm done up.
sentences.chinese: 我再也挪不動了，我精疲力竭了。

sentences.english: Shi Xiang summer Guanci apprehend came to see two people is exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 緝拿施襄夏的官差趕來，看到是精疲力竭的倆人。

sentences.english: I am shagged out after the work!
sentences.chinese: 我被這些工作搞的精疲力竭。

sentences.english: After working so long,he was quite wrung out.
sentences.chinese: 幹了很長時間的活兒，他累得精疲力竭。

sentences.english: I'm fagged out,let me rest a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我已經精疲力竭，讓我休息一會兒吧。

sentences.english: If you feel exhausted, it's not necessarily because there's something wrong with you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感到精疲力竭，這可能並非因爲你有什麼問題。

sentences.english: And Mike and Maria, from Southern California, are exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 來自南加州邁克和瑪麗亞也精疲力竭。

sentences.english: The possibility of warmongering, "racking crazy" USA being wiped out? If only.
sentences.chinese: 煽動戰爭的可能，“壓力下瘋狂”的美國精疲力竭了？

sentences.english: An exhausted Vautrin tried to accomodate them all.
sentences.chinese: 精疲力竭的魏特琳設法安置她們。

sentences.english: She was completely pumped when she reached the hill-top.
sentences.chinese: 她到達山頂時已精疲力竭了。

sentences.english: In the process he exhausts himself and loses consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 在這個過程中他精疲力竭，昏了過去。

sentences.english: We all gave out after walking a long way.
sentences.chinese: 走了一段很長的路後，我們都精疲力竭了。

sentences.english: When the rescue team returned to the village , they were completely done up.
sentences.chinese: 當營救隊回到村莊的時候，他們已經精疲力竭了。

sentences.english: The student was burned-out at the end of the semester.
sentences.chinese: 那學生在學期末時已經精疲力竭了。

sentences.english: Exhausted, she heads home for Christmas to make a new to-do list.
sentences.chinese: 精疲力竭，她回家過聖誕節元首作出新的工作清單。

definition: body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired/spent
spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
to breathe heavily like an ox (idiom)/to huff and puff
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises
riders tired and horses weary (idiom)/worn out/exhausted/spent/fatigued
to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood)/heat exhaustion
to be both mentally and physically exhausted (idiom)
